overview:
Patricia Spencer is the interim Vice-President of Marketing at Interneer, on leave from GroundWork Equity, a business acceleration firm. Patricia develops the corporate branding and identity, strategic marketing plans and marketing activities at Interneer along with other GroundWork Equity portfolio companies. Patricia joined GroundWork Equity in early 2006 after launching marketing teams within a number of early stage privately held companies.

Patricia launched her career with Body by Jake Enterprises, LLC a health and fitness company. As the Production Manager, she served as a producer and was responsible for over two hundred product and fitness shows for Fit TV, the worldâ€™s first health and fitness network.

Also an entrepreneur, Patricia has founded a number of companies, MaddieBrit, Inc. a consumer goods company developing specialized detergent & fabric care and World Class Enterprises, a partnership creating Super Soccer Skills branded youth soccer instructional DVDs & products.

via: Interneer
